website_summaries.verdict: An electric hole punch that offers a solid guide to get your papers aligned for straight holes.
pros: Can be set for either 2-hole or 3-hole punch on papers
Easy to empty hole chip tray helps eliminate the mess
Can handle a lot of paper at one time
Size is decent for desktop use
cons: This hole punch can be a little loud

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine as a replacement for one that I have had for several years made by Xerox that looks just like this one. I was extremely disappointed in the quality of this machine, very poorly made. The first problem was that the page guide as made does not fit the holes for it on the machine so that it doesn't line up and cannot be used as a page guide. The worse problem is that the 2 hole punch feature does not line up in the center of a page of 8 1/2 in paper. I need the holes to be centered on the page. I would not recommend buying and will not buy again from this source.
customer_reviews.author: Pebble Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great puncher for my home office
customer_reviews.text: Great puncher for my home office. I use the same one at work so I felt comfortable ordering this one. It’s a tad bit loud when punching other than that it working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PB50

customer_reviews.title: This electric 3-hole punch seems to work decently well when ...
customer_reviews.text: This electric 3-hole punch seems to work decently well when plugged into the right kind of power strip. You have to hold down the activate button quite firmly for the punch to work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I may have been unlucky, but this machine was inoperable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: Helps cut down time spent on administrative work. Punches holes for vertical and horizontal attaching.
customer_reviews.author: Bootz

customer_reviews.title: 1 star for product 5 star for customer support return
customer_reviews.text: The machine worked twice in the day that it came out of the box and then stopped working the next.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great for a one-handed person
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this machine, works like a charm ...I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Business Source 3-Hole Punch, Electric, 30 Sheet Cap, Gray
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm! It is a good value for the cost. Compact, easy-to-use and very efficient. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Noele Roth

customer_reviews.title: Good for punching holes for three-ring binders
customer_reviews.text: My kids punch paper all the time for school. This hole puncher is perfect for that purpose. They get a choice of standard two and three holes. They key here is "standard." There's no way to adjust the spacing if you need anything different. However, my kids only need holes for paper in their binders, so no problem here. The paper guide is a bear to get on and I still don't think it's seated all the way in. Just don't want to touch it for fear that it will fall off. It's not actually necessary, but minus one star because the guide is so hard to snap on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Business class hole punch
customer_reviews.text: The Business Source Desktop Hole Punches Powered Multi-Hole Paper Punch is on another level. It is definitely meant for a business (or education) office where this product's power is needed. It does fit on a desk but it takes up quite a bit of real estate on the desk so it isn't really meant to be for home or in an office where a paper hole puncher is needed now and again. If a hole puncher is needed on a frequent basis for reams of paper, then this would work as it has good power and it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: sanoe.net

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: What a hole punch! It will do up to 30 sheets of paper at a time. It is easy to adjust between 2 and 3 holes. There is a paper guide to help align the paper for consistent punches. It is so easy to use: plug in, add paper, press button. Would be great for schools, office, or churches.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that this can punch 2 or 3 holes in paper. Works well. A must for teachers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. Palmer

product_meta.title: Business Source Desktop Hole Punches Powered Multi-Hole Paper Punch (62901)
product_meta.description: Electric hole punch drills two or three 1/4" holes in up to 30 sheets of 20 lb. paper. Easily adjust from the two-hole to the three-hole punch position. Plastic paper guide is adjustable.
feature_bullets: Easy-to-use design automatically punches up to 30 sheets of paper
Adjustable construction quickly switches between 2 and 3 hole punches
Paper guide helps you properly align papers for consistent punches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars22 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
